flixel.addons.plugin.taskManager.AntTask

type
class

Constructor

new(Obj : Dynamic, Func : Dynamic, ?Args : Array<Dynamic>, ?IgnoreCycle : Bool, ?Instant : Bool, ?Next : AntTask)
Creates a new AntTask

Instance Variables

args : Array<Dynamic>

An array of arguments that can be passed to the task-method.

func : Dynamic

Method-task to be executed

ignoreCycle : Bool

If true then the task will be deleted from the manager immediately after execution.

instant : Bool

If true the task will be completed right after it's first call

next : AntTask

Pointer to the next task.

obj : Dynamic

An object to call func from

Instance Methods

dispose() : Void

Destroys the list.
